Title: Becky Sharp
Writer: William Makepeace Thackeray (novel), Langdon Mitchell (play), Francis Edward Faragoh (screenplay)
Actors: Miriam Hopkins, Frances Dee, Cedric Hardwicke, Billie Burke
Plot: Set against the background of the Battle of Waterloo, Becky Sharp is the story of Vanity Fair by Thackeray. Becky and Amelia are girls at school together, but Becky is from a "show biz" ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
